loans.name: Amoko

texts.en:
Amoko, 35, is a businessman who lives in Nimule. He is married with 3 children between the ages of 4 and 10. All of them go to school. Amoko runs a general store, and has been in business for 8 years. He has no employees. He heard about Finance Sudan through promotions by the loan officers. He is taking a loan of 2000 SSP to purchase more laptops, books, and many other items. In addition to this business, he has no other source of income.

In 5 years, Amoko would like to expand his business and open other branches. His major challenges include high market prices and high transportation costs. Amoko says he is happy for the loans given by Finance Sudan through the help of Kiva.

loans.use: to buy more laptops, books, pens, and other items.

loans.name: Zilpa

texts.en:
Zilpa is 33 years old and lives with her life companion and her five children, all of whom are attending school.

For the last two years, she has been selling rice in a store in her home. She started off small and then started to grow, thanks to the recommendations of her customers to other people. In this way she grew a little at a time. She considers herself to be a good entrepreneur. 

She is asking for a loan to buy sacks of rice to sell. She is thankful to Kiva and Yehu for the opportunity given to her as obtaining the loan will be a great help to her.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Zulaykho

texts.en:
Zulaykho is 22 years old. She is a kind and hardworking girl. Zulaykho is not married and lives with her parents. She is a student of the 4th course at the Pedagogical University of Tajikistan. She is one of the best students of the university, and she repeatedly takes part at competitions. 

She has a lot of friends, and all of her friends love her because she is a trusty friend. Zulaykho likes many subjects such as history, foreign languages, psychology, etc. She wants to be one of the best teachers in the future and to have many pupils. 

She must pay her tuition, but doesn't have enough money. Her parents also do not have enough money. She is asking for a loan to pay tuition. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To pay for her tuition.

loans.name: Katoi's Group

texts.en: Katoi is a 37-year-old husband and father of six. Katoi buys and sells livestock at the local market for a living, but faces the challenges of not having much capital to invest in his business and the poor market during the dry season. He joined KOMAZA to earn more capital to invest in his business, as well as to have money for educating his children. With the proceeds from his new tree farming business, Katoi aspires to build a rental house in the local town of Bamba to generate income. He was drawn to the KOMAZA program for a number of reasons: to earn the profit from his tree farm, to improve the environment and for the ease of working with the KOMAZA staff.

loans.use: to purchase inputs such as eucalyptus seedlings and fertilizer and to pay for technical training and plantation maintenance

loans.name: Gabriel's Group

texts.en: Gabriel is a 47-year-old father of seven. He and his wife are both farmers. Gabriel's business of poultry farming faces the challenges of seasonal market demand and diseases that affect his hens. Unreliable rainfall also negatively affects his agricultural endeavors. Gabriel joined the KOMAZA program to "change the environment of the area" by planting trees and earning money to support his family. He is currently sending five of his children to school and intends to use the proceeds from the tree farm to educate his family and expand his business projects.

loans.use: to purchase eucalyptus seedlings and fertilizer and to pay for technical training and plantation maintenance support

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages to add to her inventory.

loans.name: Mercedes Tarcila

texts.es:
MERCEDES TARCILA tiene 42 años de edad es soletar no tiene hijos, vive con unos familiares en la ciudad de Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

MERCEDES TARCILA se dedica a la crianza y venta de gallinas. Solicita el crédito para comprar pollos, balanceado, vacunas.   Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los animales y la alimentación. Las compras las realizará en  Guaranda. 

El sueño es ampliar el negocio. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las enfermedades a los pollos y la competencia.
En el tiempo libre le gusta reunirce con la familia.
texts.en:
Mercedes Tarcila, age 42, is single and does not have children.  She lives with some relatives in the city of Chimbo in the Bolívar province.

Mercedes Tarcila raises and sells chickens.  She is requesting the loan to buy chickens, balanced feed, and vaccines.  With the help of the loan she will be able to buy the animals and the feed.  She will make her purchases in Guaranda.

Her dream is to expand her business.  The challenges she faces are chicken diseases and the competition.

In her free time she likes to get together with the family.

loans.use: to buy chickens, balanced feed, and vaccines.

loans.name: Peter's Group

texts.en: Peter is a 41-year-old farmer on the coast of Kenya. He is married with six children. As with many farmers, Peter's agricultural business faces the challenges of rainfall scarcity, pests and diseases, and marketing difficulties. He joined the KOMAZA program because "it's a long term project for future benefits." All six of Peter's children are currently in school, and he plans to continue to educate them with the proceeds from his new tree farm. Peter's favorite part about working with KOMAZA is that the program is "bringing people together." He looks forward to improving his agricultural projects with the knowledge and money he will gain from being a KOMAZA farmer.

loans.use: to purchase eucalyptus seedlings and fertilizer and to pay for technical trainings and plantation maintenance support

loans.name: Sarangerel

texts.en: Mrs. Sarangerel is 43 years old and lives with her husband in Ger, in Tosontsengel soum of Zavhan province, Mongolia. Her husband, Bold, age 52, runs a transportation service in town. Sarangerel has been working as a tailor in a local company since 2003. She has a lot of experience in the industry and has built strong relationships with customers and suppliers over the years. She is now planning to start her own business offering tailoring service at home. She is requesting 2,600,000 MNT to purchase starting inventory for her new business. She is a hard-working and modest woman.

loans.use: to purchase starting inventory for her new tailoring business

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es: Juan de 42 años de edad,habita junto a su familia su esposa y sus hijos, es un hombre trabajador, honesto y decidido a seguirle brindando un buen futuro a su familia.  Con sus buenos modales y forma de tratar a la gente es responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar y todo lo hace pensando en sus hijos quienes son su principal fuente de inspiración para seguir adelante. Actualmente Juan se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos es así como honradamente se gana la vida, y hace que su familia posea grandes admiraciones porque se caracterizan por ser trabajadores y visionarios. El cliente desea comprar insumos agrícolas para sus cultivos ya que se vienen épocas de cosechas y desea tener lo necesario es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de Semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Espera tener la ayuda solicitada para tener las mejores cosechas y venderlos como siempre lo ha hecho y que en su hogar no falte el pan de cada día.
texts.en:
Juan is forty-two years old and lives together with his family (his wife and children).  He is a hard-working and honest man, and decided to continue forward in order to offer a good future to his family.  With his good manners and way of treating people, he is responsible with his home obligations and he does everything with his children in mind, who are the main source of inspiration for him to move forward.

Presently, Juan makes a living in cultivating basic grains.  In doing this, he honestly earns a living and his family consequently has many admirers, because they are characterized as being hard workers and visionaries.  

He hopes to buy agriculture inputs for his crops, since the harvest season is coming up and he wishes to have what is necessary.  It is for this that he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, in order to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, and other items.  He hopes to have the help requested in order to have the best harvests and to sell his goods as he has always done, so that in his home, they do not lack their daily food.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, and other items.

loans.name: Yuliya

texts.ru:
Юлия –предприниматель сектора малого бизнеса из Мелитополя. Она торгует на местном рынке ритуальными товарами. У нее давно есть свое собственное торговое место. Работает в этой сфере уже 16 лет. 
Юлия обратилась в КИВА за кредитом в размере 15 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить венки, корзины и гирлянды для своего бизнеса. Юлия понимает, что ее бизнес всегда будет актуален, потому что население будет неизменно продолжать пользоваться ритуальными услугами. Она надеется со временем улучшить благосостояние своей семьи и сделать ремонт в квартире, если ей позволят это финансы.
texts.en:
Yuliya is a small business entrepreneur from Melitopol.  She sells funeral products at the local market.  She has had her own sales spot for a long time.  She has been in this business for 16 years.

Yuliya turned to KIVA for a loan of 15,000 hryvnia in order to purchase wreaths, baskets and garlands for her business.  Yuliya understands that her business will always be relevant, because the population will continue to use bereavement services.  She hopes to improve her family's living conditions with time and to remodel her apartment if her finances allow.

loans.use: to purchase wreaths, baskets and garlands for her business

loans.name: Roby

texts.es:
Roby es un estudiante de Ingeniería de Sistemas que se dedica al mantenimiento de computadoras y equipos electrónicos. Vive en casa de sus padres que lamentablemente no pueden pagar sus estudios y sus herramientas de trabajo. Vive en la zona obispo Indaburu de la ciudad de La Paz.

El crédito lo solicita para una computadora nueva que le ayude a hacer su trabajo tanto en la Universidad como al rubro al que se dedica.

El sueño de Roby es poder terminar sus estudios e independizarse para que sus padres puedan vivir mejor.
texts.en: Reyes is a computer science student who works fixing computers and electronic equipment.  He lives in his parents’ house who sadly can’t afford to pay for his studies and work tools.  He lives in the city of La Paz’s Obispo Indaburu zone.  He requests the loan to buy a new computer that will help him both with his university courses and with the work he does.  Roby’s dream is to finish his studies and become independent so his parents can live better.

loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Asadullo

texts.ru:
Асадулло житель района Вахш. Ему 27 лет. Он недавно женился. Асадулло живет с родителями. У него среднее образование.
Асадулло занимается животноводством. Он разводит мелко - рогатый скот у себя дома. Также Асадулло занимается растениеводством. Она сеет пшеницу для продажи. Этим видом деятельности он занимается пять лет. Асадулло берет кредит для обработки земли и сезонного посева пшеницы, а также для покупки корма для скота.
texts.en:
Asadullo is a resident of the Vakhsh region.  He is 27 years old.  He got married recently.  Asadullo lives with his parents.  He has a high school education.

Asadullo raises livestock.  He raises small, horned livestock at home.  Asadullo is also a farmer.  He plants wheat for sale.  He has been in this business for five years.  Asadullo is taking out a loan to work the land and for the seasonal planting of wheat and also for the purchase of livestock feed.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fuel and livestock feed

loans.name: Patricia Guadalupe

texts.es:
Patricia, se dedica a la venta de empanadas y comida, tiene 33 años de edad, es casada y tiene tres hijos menores de edad, el negocio de Patricia tiene 5 años de existir, lo atiende de lunes a sábado, su madre le ayuda a realizar ventas.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos para la elaboración de las empanadas, comprándose plátanos, dulce, azúcar, leña y otros productos que sean necesarios para seguir realizando ventas, esta compra le ayudara para adquirir a mejor precio los productos.
La aspiración de Patricia es fortalecer el negocio y ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en: Patricia works selling turnovers and food.  She’s 33-years-old, married and has three minor children.  Patricia’s been in business five years and is open Monday through Saturday.  Her mother helps her sell.  She’s requesting a loan to buy ingredients to make turnovers.  She will buy bananas, sweets, candy, firewood and other products needed to continue with her sales.  This purchase will help her buy the products at better prices.  Her hope is to strengthen the business in order to provide better quality of life for her children.

loans.use: to buy bananas, candy, sugar, firewood and others.

loans.name: Irene

texts.es: Irene de 30 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos. Ella se dedica  a la agricultura de los principales granos básicos como son: maíz y frijol. Después de sacar la cosecha  comercializa una parte de su cultivo para poder suplir las necesidades de su hogar que cada día son mayores. Ella es una mujer muy emprendedora y admirable, no se cansa de realizar esta actividad ya que para ella, lo más importante en la vida es ganarse el pan de cada día dignamente con el trabajo de sus manos y el sudor de su frente. Ha trabajado toda su vida en la agricultura y es así como ha logrado sobrevivir, puesto que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos diferente a la agricultura. Como toda mujer emprendedora y visionaria ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a INTEGRAL ya que la fecha para empezar las siembras se aproximan y quiere estar preparada y espera recibir un prestamos: para invertir en la comprar de los insumos agrícolas como: semillas, insecticidas, abonos, u otros. Para comenzar la siembra lo más antes posible y poder cosechar los frutos de su esfuerzo. Confía plenamente que obtendrá una cosecha abundante la cual la cual le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia
texts.en:
Irene, 30, lives with her husband and children.  She works in agriculture and her main crops are corn and beans.  Once she harvests them she sells part of her crops in order to be able to meet household needs that are greater every day.  She’s a very enterprising, admirable woman who does not tire of doing this activity because the most important thing for her is to earn her daily bread honorably by means of her own hands and the sweat of her brow.

She’s worked her entire life in agriculture and this is how she’s managed to survive because she has no other source of income besides agriculture.  Like all enterprising, forward-looking women she’s decided to approach INTEGRAL because the time for starting to plant is approaching and she wants to be prepared.  She hopes to get a loan to buy farm supplies like seeds, insecticide, fertilizer and others to start planting as soon as possible so she can then harvest the fruits of her labor.  She is completely confident that she’ll get an abundant harvest that will make it possible for her to improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies like seeds, insecticide, manure, etc.

loans.name: Donaldo Antonio

texts.es: Donaldo de 37 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañera de vida y sus hijos. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace muchos años.  Donaldo cultiva los principales granos básicos como: arroz, frijoles y maíz. Cada año repite esta actividad ya que es la única forma que conoce para ganarse la vida. Es una persona muy trabajadora, responsable y emprendedora. Trabaja muy duro para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos  diferente a la agricultura. Es por esta razón que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar es préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra del abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas y semillas, ademas desea reparar su pequeña parcela de terreno para tener mas ingresos.   Con mucha confianza en Dios y en su trabajo espera tener una cosecha abundante de la cual pueda vender una parte y dejar otra parte para el consumo. Espera cumplir su sueño de dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Donaldo, 37, lives in his own house with his life companion and their children.  He’s worked in agriculture for many years.  He grows basic grains like rice, beans and corn.  He repeats this activity each year since it’s the only way he knows to earn a living.  He’s a very hardworking, responsible and enterprising man.  He works hard to bring daily bread home since he has no other source of income besides agriculture. 

Because of this he’s decided to request an INTEGRAL loan to buy manure, fertilizer, pesticide and seeds.  In addition, he wants to repair his small parcel of land to earn higher income.  With much trust in God and in his work he hopes to obtain an abundant harvest so he can sell part of it and use the rest for home consumption.  He hopes to reach his dream of providing his family with better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, pesticide and seeds and also to repair his small parcel of land.

loans.name: Hay

texts.en:
Hay, who is 43 years old and a mother of four dependent children, happily lives with her household in a small village of Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. Her main business activity is growing rice, in which she has been involved for almost 20 years. She has great support from her children and husband, to ensure an abundant harvest in each season. Rice harvest has been her major source of income.

Hay is requesting a loan amount of 1,600,000 KHR to provide for the maintenance of her rice fields. Specifically, she will buy a cow to help her in her farm work. Her main objective is to improve her farm’s productivity, with the help of proper financing she will obtain from kind lenders. After the loan use, she believes that she will be able to earn higher income to cover her household expenses, and to provide a better quality of life to everyone in her family.

loans.use: to buy a cow to support her in her farm work.

loans.name: Mogga Mathew

texts.en:
Mogga is a 38-year-old businessman who lives in Nimule. He is married and has four children between the ages of 4 and 12. All of them go to school. Mogga runs a clinic, and he has been in business for eight years. He has no employee. He heard about Finance Sudan through promotions by the loan officers.

He is taking a loan of 2,000 SSP to purchase more drugs and many other supplies for the clinic. In addition to this business, he has no other source of Income.

Within five years, Mogga would like to have expanded his business and opened other branches. His major challenges include high market prices and high transportation cost. Mogga says he is happy about the loans given by Finance Sudan, through the help of kiva.

loans.use: to buy more drugs and other supplies for the clinic.

loans.name: Jacob's Group

texts.en: Jacob is a 45-year-old married father of eight. He is a mason, building houses to earn income for his family. However, he says, "It's not easy to secure a job and payment is low." So Jacob is joining the KOMAZA program in order to "uplift the living standard of the entire family." Currently, Jacob is sending all eight of his children to school. He will use the profits from his new tree farm to continue educating his children and build a permanent house. He looks forward to being a part of the KOMAZA program because it will impart skills about farming to him, allow him to interact with KOMAZA staff and work in groups. Jacob joined the micro forestry program "to meet the KOMAZA objective: reduce poverty and improve the living standard of his family."

loans.use: to purchase eucalyptus seedlings and fertilizer and to pay for technical trainings and plantation maintenance support

loans.name: Olziisaihan

texts.en:
Mrs.Olziisaihan is 50 years old, and lives with her husband and daughter in a ger in the Orhon province of Mongolia. Her husband Buyantogtoh, age 49, is a woodsman, and for years, worked at a state-owned furniture manufacturing company. Her daughter Sarangerel, age 28, helps her parents run their small business. 

The borrower has been producing organic dairy products and selling to local customers. She has five milk breeding cattle, and produces enough organic dairy products. She is now requesting 2,000,000MNT to purchase a large amount of forage to feed their cattle during winter and spring. 

She is a hardworking, communicative, and polite woman.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of forage to feed their cattle during winter and spring.

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is 42 years old and married with two children.

Aida works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell like soap, sugar, coffee, canned goods, etc..

Aida has borrowed and paid 5 loans from NWTF prior to this loan. She has been running the general store for five years, and also earns an income from fish-vending.

Aida aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks to sell like soap, sugar, coffee, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Battulga

texts.en:
Mr. Battulga is 38 years old. He lives with his wife and two daughters, in a small house in Sainshand soum, Dornogobi province, Mongolia. His wife, Gandulam, age 28, works at a local cafe as a waitress. His daughters Naranbileg, age 11, and Undrah, age 7, go to the local primary school.

Borrower has been working as a salesperson in a second-hand clothing wholesale business, since 2004. He has gained a lot of experience in selling second-hand clothing. Now he is starting his own second-hand clothing retail shop, at a rental counter of the local market. He is requesting 1,800,000 MNT to purchase inventory from a wholesaler, which he will use to work and start his own business. He is a hard-working, positive and communicative person.

loans.use: to purchase inventory that he will use to start his own business

loans.name: Ezekiel's Group

texts.en: Ezekiel is a 49-year-old dryland farmer. He and his wife have three children, all of whom are currently in school. Ezekiel grows maize, cowpeas and green grams, raises goats and has a kiosk shop. Like many rural, dryland farmers, Ezekiel faces the challenges of drought and issues with transportation in doing business. He wants to become a KOMAZA tree farmer so he can earn money to support his family, build a good house, educate his children, and improve his farming activities by gaining knowledge from the tree farming program.

loans.use: to purchase eucalyptus seedlings and fertilizer and to pay for technical trainings and plantation maintenance support

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is a married man, age 32, with two children who have not yet started school. He is a produce dealer involved in coffee and ground nuts, which he started as a major business to sustain the family. Paul is also involved in farming as an additional source of income; he operates these businesses in the outskirts of Kagadi.

He wants a loan of UGX 2,000,000 to buy more coffee and ground nuts, since the season is now on. Paul hopes that if he invests more money into his produce business, he will be in position to realise a good return at the end .

Paul's major challenge are price fluctuations and the seasonality of the agricultural products. He would like UGAFODE Microfinance to always make funds available them whenever they have the need.

loans.use: To buy coffee and ground nuts to sell.

loans.name: Mwakaje

texts.en: Mwakaje, is 28 years old and is married with three children. She has been in business for more than two years, running a kiosk store which is well stocked with all kinds of essential goods, especially coconuts. She is a person who stands out on account of her desire to work and succeed through her business. She always strives to achieve success so as to help her family. She is seeking this loan to stock her store with drinks, baked goods, vegetables, etc. so that she can maintain her sales.

loans.use: to stock her store with drinks, baked goods, and vegetables

loans.name: Salma's Group

texts.en: Salma is a 22-year-old single mother of two. Salma's husband passed away. As a young widow, she is the sole provider for her family through the selling of agriculture produce such as mangoes and oranges. The challenges Salma faces with her current business are the seasonality of the agricultural produce trade and the perishable nature of her goods. She would like to be a KOMAZA farmer so that she can fund her children's education. In addition to funding her children's education, Salma hopes to start other businesses and build a good home for her family with the money she will generate from her KOMAZA tree farm.

loans.use: to purchase eucalyptus seedlings and fertilizer and to pay for technical trainings and plantation maintenance support

loans.name: Kuini

texts.en:
Kuini is a 59-year-old woman with five children. She has a store where she sells basic need products, like bulk grains, milk, eggs, meat, and other items. She already has a lot of customers who prefer her because of the quality of her products, accessible prices, and above all, for her excellent service.

She is an active and enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work. She has a lot of goals that she wishes to achieve, and is working hard to attain a more prosperous future. She feels very happy with her business.

In the previous weeks, demand has increased and it is because of this that she wants to make a new investment. She is requesting a loan that will allow her to buy bulk grains, instant foods/beverages, snacks, drinks, bread, etc. She has good payment references and is very responsible, assuring us that she will be able to pay off her debt while bringing economic security to her home.

loans.use: to make a new investment.

loans.name: Bayaraa

texts.en:
Bayaraa is 41 years old and lives with her husband and two children in a small house in the Orhon province of Mongolia. Her husband Vanchin, age 43, and his son Monh-Erdene, age 20, work in Uvurhangai province as welders in a mining company. Her daughter Suvdmaa, age 16, studies at a specialty training school. 

Bayaraa has been running an organic dairy products sales business at a rental counter of a local market since 1997. She is now requesting 1,000,000MNT to purchase a large amount of organic dairy products to sell to local customers. She is a hardworking, welcoming, and friendly woman.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of organic dairy products to sell to local customers

loans.name: Veronique

texts.fr: Veronique est une veuve agée de........ avec à sa charge 07 enfants.pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants,cette mère de famille 'sest lancé dans la commercialisation des boissons alcoolisées tels que: les bières 33 export,mutzig,amstel,castel,guinness et autres.elle vend egalement la nourriture.cependant,elle sollicite un credit qui va lui permettre d'avoir un stock permanent,éviter les éventuelles ruptures de stock et si possible meme,profiter de quelques ristournes venant des sociétés brassicoles. elle compte se servir des bénéfices pour renforcer davantage son activité et améliorer ainsi ses ventes.
texts.en: Veronique is a widow, …[text missing] years old, with seven children in her care. In order to provide for herself and her children, she has started a business selling alcoholic beverages, such as various brands of beer: 33 Export, Mutzig, Amstel, Castel, Guinness, etc. She also sells food.  She is seeking a loan that will allow her to keep a steady stock, avoid depleting her stock, and, if possible, take advantage of some discounts from the breweries. She plans to use her earnings to strengthen her business further and increase her sales level.

loans.use: to increase her stock of  various brands of beer: 33 Export, Mutzig, Amstel,   etc

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Mariamu

texts.en: Mariamu is a 71-year-old farmer and mother of 10. She grows maize and keeps goats, cows and chickens. Mariamu's agricultural businesses face the challenges of daily price fluctuations and drought that causes the animals to starve. Mariamu intends to use her proceeds from her KOMAZA tree farm to build a house and install power.

loans.use: to purchase eucalyptus seedlings and fertilizer and to pay for technical trainings and plantation maintenance support

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cows

loans.name: Murodbek

texts.en: Murodbek, 19 years old, is hardworking and determined. He is single and lives with his parents. Murodbek is a first year student studying in the management department at the Tajik State University. He is one of the best students and likes many subjects. His teachers know him as a smart and clever student. Murodbek must pay for his tuition but he does not have the money for it. He is asking for a loan to pay for his tuition. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To pay for his tuition

loans.name: Davaatseren

texts.en:
Mr. Davaatseren is 37 years old and lives with his wife and three children in a house in Uvurhangai province of Mongolia. His wife, Ariunaa, age 35, works at a local school as an assistant teacher. His sons, Tuvshintogtoh, age 12, and Tuvshinbayar, age 10, go to local schools, and his daughter Oyumaa, age 4, goes to a local kindergarten. 

Davaatseren has been running an organic dairy products sales business at a rental counter of a local market since 2005. He is now requesting 5,000,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of organic dairy products at wholesale.

He is a hardworking, enthusiastic and welcoming person.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of organic dairy products at wholesale.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: Victor de 44 años de edad vive junto a su familia, su esposa y sus hijos. Es un hombre con grandes aspiraciones y deseos de superación, siempre se ha caracterizado por ser un buen trabajador y todo hay sido inspirado por su familia. Siempre el su hogar jamás falta el pan de cada día y esto lo hace un gran hombre, padre ejemplar y buen esposo. Victor se dedica al cultivo de frijol y maíz. Es un hombre que siempre ha trabajado y no descansa con sus cosechas  es por eso que se acerca a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así comprar insumos necesarios como: Pesticidas, Insecticidas, Abonos para que sus cosechas no presenten problemas y él los pueda vender de manera que en su hogar no falte el pan de cada día y sobre todo que siga siendo el hombre ejemplar que es en su casa. Agradece a Dios y a las personas de buen corazon que le ayudaran a cumplir sus sueños y necesidades.
texts.en:
Victor is 44 years old. He lives with his family, his wife and children. He is a man with great aspirations and wishes to succeed. He has always been a hard worker, always inspired by his family. His home never lacks daily bread and this makes him a big man, exemplary father and good husband.
Victor grows beans and corn. He has always worked and is tireless with his crops. This is why he has contacted the field partner, INTEGRAL, to ask for a loan to buy necessary supplies such as: pesticides, insecticides and compost to avoid problems in his crops. That way he can sell them so his home will never lack daily bread and he can remain the good man he is at home.
He is grateful to God and the goodhearted people that will help him to fulfill his dreams and necessities.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as: pesticides, insecticides, and compost.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en: Lydia, 34 years old, lives in West Point, one of the most populated and well-known market areas in Montserrado county. She is married and has five children aged 10, 12, 17, 19, and 21, all living at home and attending school. For the past two years, Lydia has been selling rice, charcoal, and oil in her community. She enjoys the interaction with her customers and the profit she makes enables her to buy food for her household. Lydia faces the problem of a small income. She is requesting a loan to purchase more oil and bags of rice and charcoal for her business. Lydia's dream is to have a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, charcoal and oil for her business,

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine lives in West Point, one of the most populated and well-known market areas in Montserrado County. She is 29 years old and single, with a 9-year-old child who lives at home and is in school.

For two years, Christine has been selling door locks, door catches, nails and other items in her community. Less income is the problem she faces now.  She enjoys the interaction with her customers and the profit she generates every day.

Christine is requesting a loan to purchase more door locks, door catches, nails and other items for her business. Her dream is to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more door locks, door catches, nails and other items for her business.

loans.name: Armando Jose

texts.es:
Don Armando un humilde señor,  de 52 años, originario de Ocotal, pero actualmente vive en Estelí, soltero, padre  de 3 hijos entre las edades de 3, 8 y 18 años, de oficio agricultor, se dedica a la siembra de café. Inicio  desde muy joven trabajando con su papa en la siembra, el cual adquirió experiencia y total dominio de la siembra, luego al morir su papa, le dejo de herencia la siembra de café, fue así que empezó a cultivar café por su propia cuenta del cual ha obtenido buenas cosechas y ha podido incrementar sus ganancias, este ha sido su primer negocio, él cuenta con el apoyo de su hijo, sus expectativas es ampliar el área de siembra para obtener mejores cosechas.
Él está solicitando el financiamiento para pagar mano de obra y comprar todos los insumos necesarios tales como abono y  fertilizantes. Ya que el estima que este crédito le ayudaría a comprar todos los insumos necesarios para darle un mejor mantenimiento a su siembra, sus planes futuros es poder comprar una camioneta para transportar su cosecha  a otros departamentos, con el objetivo de crecer como un empresario exitoso, una de sus meta es poder comprar más tierra para ampliar su siembra de café.
texts.en:
Armando, a humble man of 52, is originally from Ocotal, but currently he lives in Estelí.  He is a single father of 3 children who are ages 3, 8 and 18.  He is a farmer and earns a living growing coffee.  He started from very young working with his father in the fields, from which he acquired experience and total command of planting.  

Later, when his father died, he left him the coffee fields as his inheritance.  That is how he started to grow coffee on his own, from which he has obtained good harvests and has been able to grow his earnings.  This has been his first business.  He counts on the support of his son.  His hope is to expand the planting area to obtain better harvests. 

He is requesting financing to pay for manpower and to buy the necessary supplies such as manure and fertilizers.  Because he estimates that this loan would help him to buy all of the supplies necessary to give him better maintenance of his crop, his future plan is to be able to buy a truck to transport his harvest to other areas with the objective of growing as a successful businessman.  One of his goals is to be able to buy more land to expand his coffee fields.

loans.use: to pay for manpower and to buy all of the necessary supplies such as manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Shela

texts.en:
Shella is 36, married, and has five children. She lives with her life companion and their children in their own house. She has a store where she sells common necessities: rice, beans, milk, bread, and eggs, among other items. In addition, to supplement the household expenses, she sells aluminum and clay pots. She has already been in this business for a number of years, and this has given her valuable experience that allows her to obtain the best earnings from her sales. 

She is very well known in the district since the store is well stocked and she always satisfies her customers. In addition, the products that she sells are of first quality, and she sells them at affordable prices. She is an entrepreneurial woman, very honest, and with great enthusiasm for advancing. She thinks that it is never necessary to abandon a dream, one should only try to see the signs that bring you to it. This is how she decided to apply to Yehu for a loan that will allow her to buy basic foodstuffs, candies, instant products, beverages, clay and aluminum pots, etc., for her store.

loans.use: to buy basic foodstuffs, candies, instant products, beverages, clay and aluminum pots.

loans.name: Jasmine Group

texts.en:
Dian is the leader of a 4-member loan group called “Jasmine”. The group members live in Susukan, a village in the east near Jakarta. Dian, 41 years old, has three children: Sandra, 18 years old; Arjun, 15 years old; Lira, 12 years old.

Dian has a duck farm behind her house. After two years, she increased her farm, having started with only 20 ducks and now raising almost 100 ducks. Dian enjoys this business because ducks are easily maintained; they leave and come home by themselves.

Dian and her group are requesting financial support from VisionFund Indonesia for the 2nd time so that they can increase their working capital . Dian will use this loan to buy duck food and to repair the coop. Dian's main obstacle in running this business is the rainy season, which produces many caterpillars which the ducks eat, whereupon they get sick and die. Dian dreams of sending her child to the doctor faculty.

loans.use: to repair the duck coop and to buy duck food

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en: Mwanakombo is taking out another loan of KES 10,000 to boost her business by purchasing stock. She anticipates an increase in demand for clothes which will improve her income. Mwanakombo is grateful for the support from Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes

loans.name: Hiyari

texts.en:
Hiyari is taking out another Kiva loan of KES 10,000 to expand her business. With the loan, she wants to purchase coconuts for resale, which will improve her monthly income to enable her to meet her family’s needs. 

Hiyari is thankful for Kiva lenders for the opportunity to access loans.

loans.use: to buy more coconuts to sell.

loans.name: Mwanaali

texts.en:
Mwanaali, 33 years old, lives with her husband and one child in Msambweni. She says that before she started her business she was employed as a shop attendant. Due to this job, she was able to accumulate a significant amount of capital and decided to establish her own business. Mwanaali and her husband built their house and decided to open a store with their savings. Thanks to effort and hard work, her business has expanded. Mwanaali now has a steady clientele because of the good and friendly service she provides her customers.

Mwanaali is requesting a loan to purchase supplies such as beverages, groceries, vegetables and other products, for her store.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as beverages, groceries, vegetables, etc. for her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pagnes and bras

loans.name: Yesenia Esmeralda

texts.es:
Yesenia, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para mejorar el local y tambien comprar productos para la tienda, ella reparara el piso con cemento, comprara lamina para cambiarla la que actualmente tiene, esto le ayudara a seguir prestando servicio en la venta de los productos domésticos.
Ella ha tenido un efecto positivo en el negocio, utilizando los créditos para mejorar sus ventas y las ganancias, ayudando a su familia, en especial a sus hijos en los estudios.
texts.en:
Yesenia has decided to ask for a successive loan to improve the premises of her shop. She also wants to buy supplies for it. 
She will repair the floor with cement and will buy metal sheets to change the ones currently on the roof. This will help her to keep providing service at her home products shop.
She has had a positive effect in her business, using loans to improve her sales and her profit, and helping her family, in particular her children, with their studies.

loans.use: To buy cement and metal sheets to improve the selling premises.

loans.name: Mwanajuma

texts.en:
Mwanajuma is a 41-years-old woman who has been operating a food stall for the past ten years. She is a woman of high integrity who has been a role model in her community. She is a mother of seven children. Mwanajuma is an enterprising woman who has the urge to move forward in life. The loan she is requesting is for Ksh 50,000 which she plans to use to buy utensils, renovate the business premise and add stocks of ingredients.

Mwanajuma hopes to grow her business so that she can provide her family financial security.

loans.use: to buy utensils, renovate the business premise and add stocks of ingredients.

loans.name: Mwanaisha

texts.en: Mwanaisha, 56 years old, lives with her life companion and their six children in their own house. She has a store where she sells coconuts. Mwanaisha has already been in this business for a number of years, and this has given her valuable experience that allows her to obtain the best earnings from her sales. She is very well known in the district since the store is well stocked and she always satisfies her customers. In addition, the products that Mwanaisha sells are of first quality, and she sells them at affordable prices. This is how she decided to apply to Yehu for a loan that will allow her to stock her store by buying coconuts wholesale.

loans.use: to stock her store by buying coconuts wholesale.

loans.name: Boriya

texts.en:
Mr. Boriya is 58 years old and lives with his wife and two sons in the Baganuur district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. His wife, Chuluuntsetseg, age 51, helps her husband to run his business of shoe repair in a rental place. His sons, Batbold, age 21, and Ganbold, age 23, are university students. 

Boriya has been running a shoe repair business in a rental place since 1998. He is now requesting 400,000 MNT to pay his son’s university tuition fee. 

Boriya is a hardworking and diligent man.

loans.use: to pay his son's university tuition fee.

loans.name: Ines Laure

texts.fr: Ines est une femme de 34 ans, célibataire et mère d'un enfant de 6 ans qui va à l'école. Elle gère une petite alimentation dans un quartier de la ville depuis 1 an. Elle y vend des boissons hygiéniques et des produits alimentaires. . Elle sollicite alors ce crédit pour pouvoir acheter plus de casiers de boissons afin renforcer son stock de marchandises (boissons hygiéniques)pour satisfaire sa clientèle grandissante. Les bénéfices que lui apportera ce crédit seront en partie réinvestis dans son activité et le reste sera injecté pour assouvir les besoins de sa petite famille.
texts.en: Ines is a 34 year old woman, single and mother of one six year old child who goes to school. She has managed a small food store in an area of the city for a year. There she sells beverages and food products. She is asking for this loan in order to be able to buy more cases of drinks so that she can reinforce her merchandise stock to satisfy her growing customer base. The profits that this loan will bring her will be in part reinvested in her business, and the rest will be used to satisfy the needs of her small family.

loans.use: to buy beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy bananas and pineapple for resale

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan, se dedica a la venta de gas propano, vive con su esposa y una hija de tres años de edad, él inicio el negocio por la necesidad de llevar el sustento a su familia, comenzó con 20 cilindros de gas, ahora tiene 70, su horario es de 8:00am hasta las 5:00pm.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de un pedido de cilindros de gas,  para poder abastecer el negocio y mantener sus ventas, adquiriendo más estará incrementando el inventario para atender la demanda.
La aspiración de Juan es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, a través de su trabajo en el negocio, además de que desea a futuro comprar un vehículo para el negocio.
texts.en:
Juan sells propane gas. He lives with his wife and a three-year-old daughter. He started his business to provide for his family. He started up with 20 gas cylinders and now has 70. His working hours are from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm.
He is asking for a loan to fulfill a purchase order of gas cylinders, in order to stock his business and keep his sales. By buying more cylinders, he increases his supplies to meet the demand.
Juan's wish is to improve his family's quality of life through his work in his business. He also wishes to buy a vehicle for the business in the future.

loans.use: To buy gas cylinders.

loans.name: Teresa Margot

texts.es:
TERESA MARGOT tiene 61 años de edad es casada no tiene hijos, vive en casa con unos familiares en Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

TERESA MARGOT tiene una panaderia. Solicita el crédito para comprar harina, queso, manteca, levadura. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para la elaboración del pan. 

Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Guaranda. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es la competencia. 

El sueño es mejorar el nivel de vida. En el tiempo libre le gusta caminar por la ciudad.
texts.en:
Teresa is 61 years old. She is married and has no children. She lives at home with some family members in Chimba, Bolívar Province.

Teresa has a bakery. She is requesting this loan to buy flour, cheese, shortening, and yeast. With the support from this loan, she will be able to buy what is necessary to make bread. 

She will make her purchases in the city of Guaranda. The challenge that she faces is competition. 

Her dream is to improve her standard of living. In her free time, she likes to walk through the city.

loans.use: to buy flour, cheese, shortening, and yeast.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: Don Alfredo tiene 40 años de edad, es casado, tiene dos hijos y vive con su familia en el municipio de la Masica, Atlántida. Don Alfredo realiza su propia actividad de generación de ingresos. El compra y vende ganado en la comunidad y a sus alrededores. Con las ganancias aporta al hogar para el sostenimiento familiar. Actualmente ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 15,000 Lempiras para comprar ganando y venderlos, ya que no tiene el dinero suficiente para la compra. Su meta es darles el estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en: Alfredo, 40, is married and has 2 children.  He lives with his family in the town of Masica, in the department of Atlántida.  Alfredo earns a living through his own business. He buys and sells cows in his community and in the surrounding areas.  With the profits he earns, he pays for the household expenses and supports his family.  At this time, he is requesting a loan of 15,000 Honduran lempiras to buy cows to sell, because he currently lacks the money to make this purchase.  His goal is to provide his children with an education.

loans.use: to buy cattle to sell

loans.name: Enilson Obdulio

texts.es: Eilson de 40 años de edad,  habita junto a su esposa y sus hijos. Él se dedica a la crianza de pollos y al cultivo de granos basicos. Es un hombre muy emprendedor y  trabajador. Lo más importante que realiza su trabajo con mucha dedicación y esto hace que las personas le tenga confianza. Es muy importante mencionar que estas actividades son sus principales fuentes de ingresos por lo que trabaja muy duro para poder seguir recibiendo los frutos de su trabajo. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL en la compra de insumos como diferentes: concentrado, desparasitartes, vitaminas, etc. De esta forma espera mejorar sus ganancias y poder dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida, y que ne su hogar no falte el pan de cada dia.
texts.en:
Eilson, who is 40 years old, lives with his spouse and children.  He raises chickens and cultivates grains and beans as well.  He is a very entrepreneurial and hardworking man.  The most important thing is that he does is working with great dedication, and this means that people have confidence in him.

It is important to mention that these activities are his main sources of income and that he works very hard to be able to continue receiving the fruits of his labors.  He made the decisions to ask for a loan from INTEGRAL to buy different inputs, like feed concentrate, anti-parasitics, vitamins, etc.  With these, he hopes to increase his profits and to give his family a better quality of life, and that his home will not be without their daily bread.

loans.use: to buy inputs like feed concentrate, anti-parasitics, and vitamins.

loans.name: Holger Arnulfo

texts.es:
HOLGER ARNULFO tiene 51 años de edad es casado tiene un hijo, vive con la esposa y con el hijo e la ciudad de Chimbo Provincia de Bolìvar.

HOLGER ARNULFO se dedica a la agricultura. Solicita el crédito para comprar un celular. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar el celular que tanta falta le hace para estar en contacto con las personas del negocio.

La compra la realizará en Guaranda. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es la competencia.

El sueño es seguir mejorando el estilo de vida. En el tiempo libre le gusta reunirce con los amigos.
texts.en:
Holger Arnulfo is 51 years old and married and has one son.  He lives with his wife and his son in the city of Chimbo, part of the province of Bolìvar.

Holger Arnulfo works in agriculture.  He is asking for a loan to buy a cell phone.  With the help of this loan, he will be able to buy a phone, which he needs in order to be in contact with others for  business.

He will make his purchase in Guaranda. The only obstacle he faces is competency with the phone.

His dream is to continue improving his lifestyle.  In his free time he likes to get together with his friends.

loans.use: to buy a cell phone.

loans.name: Veronica Elizabeth

texts.es:
Verónica, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, por la necesidad de aumentar el inventario en el negocio, se comprara churros, gaseosas, pan, condimentos, y otros productos de primera necesidad, esto ayudara a que ella se mantenga en el negocio.
Con el préstamo anterior su negocio aumento sus ventas, mejoro sus ingresos, esto le permitió mantener lo necesario en su familia, adquirió un vehículo para su familia y para el negocio.
texts.en:
Verónica has decided to take out a new loan because she needs to expand her inventory in the shop.  She will buy churros (a fried traditional pastry), sodas, bread, condiments, and other basic groceries.  This will help her to maintain her business.

With her previous loan, her business increased its sales and improved its profits.  This allowed her to provide for her family's necessities, and she also rented a vehicle for use by the family and the business.

loans.use: to buy churros (pastries), sodas, bread, and condiments.

loans.name: Mayra Sebastiana

texts.es:
Mayra Sebastiana de 45 años de edad, casada, viví en la ciudad de Masaya, lugar que está ubicado en la zona sur de león. Ella se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsables, lo cual lo ha demostrado en los créditos anteriores en cuanto a la responsabilidad de sus pagos en tiempo y forma. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera universitaria, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar con los gastos del hogar.
Gracias a su espíritu  y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica la crianza y venta de cerdos a los comerciantes de la localidad. La cual lo utiliza para elaborar comidas típicas de la región. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y comprar un lote de cerdos para la crianza y venta, ya que se lo están dando a buen precio. Mayra  Sebastiana agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua. Para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Mayra Sebastiana is 45 years old. She is married and lives in the city of Masaya, locate din the southern part of Leon. She is described as being a hardworking, responsible woman who has shown with previous loans that she pays them off responsibly. Unfortunately, due to a lack of resources, she was unable to go to college and had to work from a very young age to help pay the household expenses. 

Thanks to her spirit and her desire to get ahead, her economic activity is raising and selling pigs to area merchants. They use the meat to make  traditional dishes from the region. The reason for the loan is to invest in working capital to buy a lot of pigs to raise and sell, since they are at a good price. Mayra  Sebastiana is grateful to the Kiva investors for offering help to low income people in poor countries like Nicaragua so they can have dignified work.

loans.use: to stock her pig raising and selling business to make traditional dishes from the region.

loans.name: Isiatu

texts.en:
Isiatu lives in West Point, one of the most populated and well known market areas in Montserrado County. She is 41, married and has five children between the ages of 8 and 27 years old that live at home. Three of them attend school. 

For three years she has been selling ice in the market. One of the problems she faces is a small income. She enjoys the interaction with her customers and the profit she makes enables her to buy food. She is proud of her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more ice to resell. Her dream is to own a house for her children .

loans.use: to purchase more ice to resell.

loans.name: Binti

texts.en:
Binti is taking out another Kiva loan of Kshs 10,000 to boost her retail shop business. With the loan, she wants to purchase basic necessities to supply her store, such as beverages, vegetables, meats, breads and other items in order to keep working and offering good products to her customers. 

Binti is grateful for the support she is getting from Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase beverages, vegetables, meats, breads and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a bundle of mixed clothing.

loans.name: Cándida Rosa

texts.es:
La Señora Candida Rosa,  emprendedora y trabajadora, labora diario desde las seis de la mañana hasta las Cinco de la tarde. En un mercado capitalino, su negocio es la venta de ropa usada ella atiende su negocio junto a su esposo y su hija.
     
Solicita el  préstamo a ceprodel para invertirlo en compra de mercadería paca de ropa la cual le permitirá mayor variedad para ofrecerles a sus clientes. así mismo esto le permitirá incrementar su negocio.
texts.en:
Candida Rosa is hardworking and entrepreneurial, and she works daily from six in the morning until five in the evening.  In a market in the capital, she runs her business in used clothing sales, which she looks after alongside her husband and her daughter.

She is asking for a loan from Ceprodel to invest in buying merchandise, bundles of bulk used clothing, which will permit her to offer a greater variety to her customers.  This will also allow her to increase her business.

loans.use: to buy bundles of used clothing.

loans.name: Luis Arnulfo

texts.es:
LUIS ARNULFO tiene 33 años de edad es casado no tiene hijos, vive con la esposa en Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

LUIS ARNULFO se dedica  a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, insecticidas, líquido mata maleza, ranger. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes. 

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es la competencia y la plaga en los cultivos. 

El sueño es mejorar el nivel de vida. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbool.
texts.en:
LUIS ARNULFO is 33 years old. He is married and has no children. He lives with his wife in the Chimbo province of Bolívar.

LUIS ARNULFO is a farmer and grows corn. He is asking for the loan to buy urea, insecticide, liquid weed killer and ranger herbicide. With the help from the loan, he will be able to buy fertilizer. ranger. 

The challenges he faces are the competition and crop pests. His dream is to improve the quality of his housing. In his free time, he likes to play soccer.

loans.use: to buy urea, insecticide, liquid weed killer and ranger herbicide.

loans.name: Mamu

texts.en: Mamu, 30 years old, lives in West Point, one of the most populated and well-known market areas in Montserrado county. She is single and has a 5-year-old child who lives at home and goes to school. For three years, Mamu has been selling rubber dishes in the local market. She spends 8 hours daily on her business and she really enjoys the interaction with her customers and the profit she gains every day. Mamu's small income is a problem. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rubber dishes (cups, bowls, spoons, plates, tubs) for her business. Her dream is to have her own house in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more rubber dishes for her business

loans.name: Enkhbaatar

texts.en:
Mr. Enkhbaatar, 33 years old, lives with his wife and child in Dornod, an eastern province in Mongolia. The family resides in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land. Since 2002, Enkhbaatar has been providing hairdressing services to local people. His wife offers the same services in another barber shop. Their 2-year-old son goes to pre-school.

In autumn 2012, the family began building their own house with planks. Due to lack of finances, the interior work is not complete so Enkhbaatar is requesting a loan of 1,500,000 MNT to purchase construction materials such as cement, gypsum, panels, etc. As a result, the family can live in a more comfortable and warm place. Enkhbaatar used his previous loan to open another barber shop and repaid the loan on an established schedule. He is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as cement, gypsum and panels

loans.name: Adan Enrique

texts.es: Adan de 49 añosde edad  habita en casa de su propiedad  junto con su grupo familiar su esposa y sus hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos es decir Maíz y Frijol . Este ha sido su negocio desde hace muchos años, y es lo que le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Adan es un hombre muy trabajador del cual muchas personas dan buenas referencias.  Por medio del cultivo de estos productos es como puede ir subsistiendo él y su familia ya que cada año al sacar la cosecha pone a la venta una parte para sacar los ingresos necesarios para cubrir otras necesidades del hogar. Su deseo es  invertir  un poco más en la agricultura con el fin de cosechar una mayor cantidad de granos básicos que le permitan mejorar su nivel de  ventas como sus ingresos. Esta es la razón por la  que tomo la decisión de acercarse  a INTEGRAL,  para invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas como: abonos, semillas,  fertilizantes, pesticidas etc.  Para invertir en la cosechar de una  mayor cantidad  de granos básicos y lograr el objetivo final de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Confía en Dios y en su trabajo que logrará resultados favorables.
texts.en: Adan is 49 years old. He lives in his own home with his family, his wife and children. He grows basic grains, that is, corn and beans. He has had this business for many years and it allows him to bring home the daily bread. Adan is a very hardworking man who has good references from a lot of people. Growing these products is how he and his family can subsist, taking out the harvest every year and selling a part of it to have the income they need for other household needs. He wants to invest a little more in the farming so his harvest will yield more basic grains that will allow him to improve his sales and income. That is why he made the decision to approach INTEGRAL, to invest in agricultural materials such as manure, seeds, fertilizer, pesticides, etc.   with the ultimate goal being improving his and his family's quality of life. He trusts in God and in his work bringing favorable results.

loans.use: to buy agricultural materials such as fertilizer, seeds, manure, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: María De Jesús

texts.es:
La señora María de Jesús,  es una mujer trabajadora, labora diario desde las seis de la mañana hasta las tres de la tarde.

 En un centro de salud desempeñándose como enfermera desde hace 10 años  labora en esta institución del estado.
     
Solicita el  préstamo a ceprodel  para invertir en  la reparación de su casa, lo cual será reforzamiento de paredes y reparación de techo. Estas mejoras le permitirán reparar su vivienda.

 este crédito lo invertirá en compra  materiales de construcción de cinz, cemento, hierro, arena,   de esta forma  le permitirá ir mejorando su condición de vida y la de su familia al mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
María de Jesús is a hard-working woman. She works every day from six in the morning to three in the afternoon. 

She works in a health center as a nurse. She has worked in this state institution for 10 years. 
     
She is requesting the loan from Ceprodel to invest in repairing her house by reinforcing the walls and repairing the roof. These improvements will permit her to repair her home. 

She will invest this loan in buying construction materials, such as zinc, cement, iron and sand. In this way she will be able to continue improving her living conditions and those of her family, by improving their home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to improve her home.

loans.name: Maa Laxmi Naryani Shg Group

texts.en:
In 2012, Maa Laxmi Naryani SHG was formed with 12 women from a small village in Odisha. Banita is selected as the leader of the group. The lady who is sitting in the second position from the left side of the photograph is Banita. 

With the initiative of Banita they are doing monthly saving and solving their problem among the group. They are also taking part in the village decision-making meeting.

Banita is a 30-year-old lady living with her one daughter, one son and her husband. Her husband is involved in agriculture activities. He has nine years of experience in this activity. Because of the growing price of fertilizers and pesticides, they are unable to use fertilizers and pesticides as per the requirement and they are not able to pay the labour charges also. So Banita has applied for a loan to purchase fertilizers and pesticides and to pay the labor charges. 

Banita says that this loan can help her to increase her family income and she can provide study materials according to the needs of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides and to pay labor charges.

loans.name: Hector Antonio

texts.es:
Héctor, se decidió por un nuevo crédito para la compra de frijol para semilla, porque se dispone a sembrar, así como tambien cacao, tamarindo, pagara el alquiler del terreno y de ser posible tambien comprara un cerdo, esto le ayudara para que él siga realizando su trabajo.
Con el préstamo anterior tuvo un efecto positivo, realizando la siembra de maíz, tabaco, frijol, y la producción fue abundante, su deseo es comercializar el cacao y tamarindo, en su familia se ha mantenido con sus ingresos, su deseo es mejorar la vivienda y sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Héctor has decided to request a new loan to buy beans for their seeds, because now is the time to plant.  He will would also like to use the loan to buy coco plants, tamarind trees, and also pay to rent the land and buy a hog, which will all help him continue to do his job.

The previous loan had a positive impact on his income, as he was able to plant corn, tabacco and beans, which resulted in an abundant harvest.  He hopes to sell the coco and tamarind.  He has been able to support his family with his income, and he would like to improve their standard of living and get ahead.

loans.use: to buy beans, coco and tamarind to plant.

loans.name: Erdenetsetseg

texts.en: Mr. Erdenetsetseg is 46 years old and lives with his wife and two daughters in a 'ger' in Uvurhangai province of Mongolia. His wife Enhtuya, age 39, works at a local company. His daughter Janchiv, age 21, is a university student and his daughter Dashzeveg, age 11, is a local school student. He has been working as a salesman in pelts and leather retail in a rental place at the local market since 2002. He is now planning to start his own animal pelt and leather business in that local market. He has a lot of experience in the field. He is requesting 3,600,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of animal pelts from herders and sell them to manufacturers. He is hardworking, friendly and a responsible man.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of animal pelts from herders and sell them to manufacturers

loans.name: Mwanatumu

texts.en:
Mwanatumu has a general store, and she has devoted herself to this business activity for over 15 years. She has a very good clientele. This is because she has all types of products, and this is what the people look for nowadays.

She is very enterprising, and she says she really likes to help the people most in need. Her objective is to enlarge her place. This way she will be a source of work for more people.

She is requesting the loan to buy vegetables, milk, and other products. She will do this in order to be able to stock her store and to continue offering her customers a good variety.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, milk, and other products.

loans.name: Batchimeg

texts.en: Mrs. Batchimeg, 36 years old, is the female head of the family living with her 2 sons in a ger (a traditional Mongolian yurt) in Dornogovi province, Mongolia. Her son, Bayarbat, has just returned from military service and her other son, Bayarsaihan, age 13, goes to the local school. Batchimeg has been running a business selling general products at a rental counter of the local market since 2009. Her older son is now planning to start his own interior designing service business in town. Batchimeg is requesting a loan of 2,500,000 MNT to purchase equipment and tools for her son to start his own business. Batchimeg's family all are hardworking and friendly people.

loans.use: to purchase equipment and tools for her son to start his own business

loans.name: Vernus

texts.en: Vernus, 30 years old,  lives in West Point, one of the most populated and well-known markets in Montserrado county. She is married to a businessman and has two children, 8 and 12 years old, both in school and living at home. For the past three years, Vernus has been selling used clothes in her community market. She got money from her husband to start this business. Vernus is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for her business. She wants to buy land and to build her house.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes

loans.name: Mwanasha

texts.en: Mwanasha is taking out another Kiva loan of KES 50,000 to boost her food business by purchasing tomatoes, peppers, onions, chicken, rice, and other products. She dreams of expanding her business to earn more profits.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes, peppers, onions, chicken, rice, etc.

loans.name: Hector Arely

texts.es:
Héctor, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para poder invertir en la producción de granos básicos, comprara insumos agropecuarios como el abono, herbicidas, tambien pagara mano de obra para realizar el trabajo.
Él manifiesta que obtuvo mejores ganancias con el cultivo anterior, porque adquirió todo lo necesario para realizar el trabajo, con estas ganancias compra lo necesario para las necesidades básicas del hogar, en su familia sus condiciones se mantienen y su núcleo familiar tambien.
texts.en:
Héctor has decided on a new loan to invest in the production of basic grains. He will buy agricultural supplies like fertilizer and herbicides and will also pay for the day labor needed to complete his work. 

He states that he received better earnings with the previous harvest because he was able to get everything he needed to realize his work. With these earnings he is buying what is necessary for his home's basic needs. His nuclear and extended family's conditions have been kept up.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, herbicides and pay for day labor.

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en: Hawa lives in West Point, one of the most populated and best known market areas in Montserrado county. She is 35 years old and stopped her education at grade 8. She is  married with two children aged  6 and 8  that live at home, and both of them attend school. For two years she has been selling charcoal  in her community. A problem she faces is  her small income but  she enjoys the interaction with her customers and the profit she makes  enables her to buy   food for her home and makes her proud of her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase charcoal for her business. In the near future she hopes  to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for her business

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is married and has four children, all attending school. She also takes care of additional family members (a brother). Jane has operated a tailoring business for five years. She works seven days every week in a shop that she rents. Jane's major business challenges include defaulters and seasonality. She has applied for a loan of 300,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more rolls of clothing materials and thread. Jane aspires to become a wholesaler, to buy more sewing machines and to build her own house. She resides in a rented house and the family has no access to electricity or piped water. Jane's monthly expenses include school fees, rent and food for the family.

loans.use: To buy more rolls of clothing materials and thread

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
Mwanakombo, 32 years old, is married and has four children. She lives with her family in a house she’s rented for several years. Mwanakombo has a small store, selling basic staple goods and snacks, among others. She also provides milling services and sells beauty products. Mwanakombo is a very hardworking woman who does various things to have a stable life.

Mwanakombo is asking Yehu for a loan to buy larger amounts of products for her store to stock it with everything necessary. She will also buy cosmetics and other beauty products to subsequently sell from place to place. In this way, she hopes to improve her profits.

loans.use: to buy larger amounts of products for her store

loans.name: Alcides Aristides

texts.es:
Alcides, se dedica a la venta de sal, vive con su familia, está casado, tiene dos hijos de 5 y 7 años, dependen económicamente de él, Alcides inicio el negocio como un medio para mantener en el hogar lo necesario, aprendió el negocio de su padre, él procesa  la sal y la empaca para la venta.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de bolsas de empaque, tambien para pagar mano de obra, esto le ayudara a mejorar la producción y las ventas.
Su objetivo es a través del negocio mejorar su condición de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
Alcides lives with his family and earns his living by selling salt. He is married and has two children (ages 5 and 7) who are financially dependent on him. Alcides started this business as a way of providing his household with whatever is needed. He learned this business from his father. Alcides processes the salt and then packages it for sale.

He is currently requesting a loan so that he can buy packing bags. Alcides will also pay for labor, which will help with both production and sales. His goal is to see that his business improves his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bags for packaging salt and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Maria Ursula

texts.es:
María, necesita dinero para poder invertir en el negocio, recibió una buena atención y necesita compra plátanos, aceite y leña, esto le ayudara a que María pueda mejorar su negocio y la disponibilidad para realizar sus ventas.
Con el préstamo anterior fortaleció el negocio, aumento las posibilidades de venta, gracias al crédito de Kiva ha mejorado sus condiciones económicas, en su familia todos se mantienen bien.
texts.en:
María needs money to be able to invest in her business, which has experienced a strong demand. She needs to buy plantains, oil, and firewood. This will help María to be able to improve her business and be available to make her sales.

With the previous loan, she strengthened her business and increased her potential sales. Thanks to the loan from Kiva, she has improved her financial conditions. In her family, everyone is doing well.

loans.use: to buy plantains, oil, and firewood.

loans.name: El Pedregal Group

texts.es:
La señora Alicia es miembro del grupo El Pedregal, ella tiene 38 años de edad, estudio solo la secundaria, se encuentra casada, y tiene 3 hijos los cuales asisten a la primaria de la comunidad. Ella platica que hace un poco mas de 9 años inició a vender zapatos y cosméticos por catalogo, los cuales vende casa por casa con sus amigos y vecinos. Ella primero lleva a mostrar sus catalogos, levanta un pedido, lo encarga a sus proveedores y cuando su paquete llega lo entrega a sus clientes y recibe el pago por sus productos. Doña Alicia demas de vender sus zapatos y cosmeticos vende de lunes a viernes antojitos mexicanos (empanadas, tostadas. tacos, gorditas) y dulces en la primaria de su comunidad en la hora en la que los niños salen al recreo. Ella necesita este credito para invertirlo en la compra de catalogos, zapatos, perfumeria, cosmeticos, tomates, chiles, cebollas, carne, aceite, sal, crema, queso y gas. Ella espera que con esta inversion su negocio propere ya que desea darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y que en un furuto estudien una profesion para que puedan salir adelante.

 Los demas integrantes del grupo se llaman:
Isidra venta de comida
Blanca venta de ropa 
Edith venta de ropa 
Paula venta de refrescos
Indira venta de colchas
Olga venta de calzado 
Alvaro servicio electrico
Soila venta de refrescos
texts.en:
Alicia is a member of the group "El Pedregal." She is 38 years old. She only completed her secondary education. She is married and has three children who attend the community's primary school. A little more than 9 years ago, she began to sell shoes and cosmetics through catalog sales. She sells door-to-door with her friends and neighbors. She first shows her catalogs, then takes an order, delivers it to her suppliers, and when the package arrives, she delivers it to her customers and receives the payment for the product. Besides selling shoes and cosmetics, Alicia sells traditional corn-based Mexican dishes (empanadas, tostadas, tacos, gorditas) and candies from Monday to Friday at the community's primary schools during the children's recess time. She needs this loan in order to buy catalogs, shoes, perfumes, cosmetics, tomatoes, chiles, onions, meat, oil, salt, cream, cheese, and gas for the stove. She hopes that with this loan her business prospers since she wants to provide her children with a better quality of life, and in the future, the means to study a profession so that they can move forward.

The others members of the group are Isidra, who sells food; Blanca, who sells clothing; Edith, who sells clothing; Paula, who sells refreshments; Indira, who sells quilted cloths; Olga, who sells footwear; Alvaro, who is an electrician; and Soila, who sells refreshments.

loans.use: to purchase catalogs, shoes, perfume, cosmetics, ingredients to prepare food

loans.name: Weatta

texts.en: Weatta live in West Point, Montserrado County, which is the most noted commercial city in Liberia. She is 31 years old, and has three children aged 5 months, 8 and 12 years old. For the past 2 years she has been selling oranges in the local market on a table. One of the problems she faces is little capital.  She enjoys the profit she makes every day which provides  money for her expenses. This makes her proud of her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more oranges for her business. She dreams of building a house .

loans.use: to purchase more oranges for her business,

loans.name: Al Hawraa Group

texts.en:
Fatima is the featured borrower of Al Hawraa's group. She got together with her other group members to request this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. She is seated on the right. She has been working in a clothes factory for 10 years, and does well in her business because of her special talent, good quality of production and reputation. She is a 43-year-old married woman and is the mother of three children (Ali-M-28, Nana-F-18 and Samar-F-15). She works hard to help her husband in making their living and covering their expenses.

Because of increasing family needs and requests, Fatima is going to start her own sewing business to increase their income. She will pursue this in addition to her job. She is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, in order to buy the necessary sewing machine to start her own business.

Zeinab is a 40-year-old married woman and the mother of three children (Bassam-M-14, Doha-F-12, Ali-M-7). She has worked in the cleaning department at a school for one year. She is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to buy a washing machine that is necessary for her household needs.

Hilda is a 36-year-old married woman and the mother of three children (Sara-F-16, Hassan-M-12, Ali-M-5). She has worked in the cleaning department at a school for one year. She is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to pay for her children's school fees.

loans.use: To buy a special updated sewing machine to start her own business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to finish building a bathroom and plaster the bedroom

loans.name: Josepine

texts.en: Josephine live in West Point which is one of the most populated and well known markets in Montserrado county. She is 28 years old, single and has a nine year old child that lives at home and attends school. For years she has been running a market table where she sells cold water fish and other fish. One of the problems she faces is that during the rainy season she doesn’t have a good spot to sell from.  She enjoys the interaction with her customers and the profit that she makes. Having food in her home makes her proud of her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more cold-water-fish and ocean-fish like cassava and butter nose fish to resell. Her dream is to have a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more cold-water-fish and ocean-fish like cassava fish and butter nose fish to resell.

loans.name: Mwanasha

texts.en: Mwanasha is 40 years old and married with six children, all of whom are still in school. She has always worked and been responsible and enterprising. She has a small business for selling fish located in her house. She has always worked doing what she likes the most. She is described as friendly and that's why her customers prefer her. She wants to buy materials to build a shop and that is why she has asked Yehu for a loan.

loans.use: to buy materials to build a shop
